Reminder

Dear ${managerFirstName},

Reminder: Itâ€™s time to recognize your employee! On ${awardDate}, ${recipientFirstName} ${recipientLastName} will celebrate ${yearsOfService} years of service at Hewlett Packard Enterprise. To commemorate this milestone, ${recipientFirstName} will receive a personalized Celebrating Service website (PURL) and a Celebrating Service gift, but you have steps to take to ensure that the experience is a positive one for your employee.

Action required:

Send Recognition PURL invitations

  1. Go to MyRecognition @hpe and check the "Activity Center " or view the notification in the upper corner next to your picture (noted by red circle with number).
  2. Follow the prompts to the PURL Contribution page.
  3. Invite colleagues by entering their primary HPE email addresses. They can contribute by adding messages, photos, or video links. (Note: Forwarding this email will not generate invitations to contribute.)
  4. Add your own message of congratulations by clicking on the "Contribute to this Recognition PURL " button.
  5. Don't delay! You and invited colleagues only have until ${purlInvitationEndDate} to contribute, and the PURL will be sent to ${recipientFirstName} to view. Once the PURL is sent, no additional comments may be added.

Other optional actions

  1. Delay delivery of the PURL. (if employee is on vacation or leave): Select "View PURL Activity Award Date" on the Recognition PURL Activity page and modify the date.
  2. Stop Delivery of the PURL: If you believe this employee should not receive a Recognition PURL, please Contact Us immediately to stop distribution.

Thank you for creating a memorable recognition experience for ${recipientFirstName}! Celebrating our employees reinstates the importance of the HPE Culture, so we thank you for contributing to that!

MyRecognition @hpe Program Team

Problems accessing the PURL? Check the email address to which this message was sent. If it is an alias address and not your primary HPE email address, you may not be able to contribute to the Celebrating Service PURL. To contribute to the PURL, please contact the employee who invited you and ask him or her to invite you using your primary HPE email address. Your primary email address is viewable in People Finder on the @hpe portal.

Need additional information? To learn more about HPE's recognition programs, please visit MyRecognition @hpe > Resource Center.

Want to recognize others? To recognize a colleague or manager, view recognitions you have given or received, or redeem an award, visit your personalized MyRecognition @hpe webpage.
